name: Scrapyard (spoonsweet)
description:
Move around with arrow keys, and explore the level!
Made for GDKO2023 with the theme: "Create a single level in a unique location".

A snowy scrapyard felt like the right place!

Game made with Godot and Asesprite. Come say hi!

http://youtube.com/c/spoonsweet 

https://twitter.com/spoonsweet1

Awesome music by: Hart find him: https://soundcloud.com/user-682766289

and here: https://www.youtube.com/user/HartkorcraftPOWRACA/videos

https://hartkorcraft.bandcamp.com/
